About the Company: Miven Machine Tools Ltd. are one of the leading manufacturers and suppliers of Heavy Duty CNC Lathe Machines for various industries. Over the years, we have given our best positive efforts in qualitative manufacturing and supplying quality products for our valued clients worldwide. We have one of the most sophisticated manufacturing units which are used to produce world class machines so that our valued clients can enjoy the fruits of this new hi-tech world. In addition, we strictly adhere to high quality standard for products and give top importance to customer satisfaction.
